name: Company Experience: Pollution Economics
description: Company Experience: Pollution Economics is a game made for CSI 3380 by the Back 5 group. This game is about running a company in a competitive environment where you need to balance cost and pollution. Our intent is to help people understand what its like to run a company and compete with others and why its not so easy to be a "green" company.  Players can see how some common ideas like carbon tax and government incentives affect this dynamic.
